info.author: Fabio N. Filasieno
classifiers: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries
info.description:
# coding=utf-8

======================
 HsmTranquillity 0.1.0
======================

A web server designed to ease development of asynchronous, scalable
but especially *reliable* web applications.

It uses hierarchical state machines as core object model instead of plain
objects, allowing the user to dynamically change the behaviour of services
and reliably manage exceptions.

Same concepts of Tornado or Twisted, but instead of using objects it
uses hierarchical finite state machines.

Features:
---------
- Hsm as finite state machine framework
- Mako as template engine
- Yaml as configuration language
- Support most features of the Java web.xml for web app configuration

Planned:
---------
 - Nginx module
 - formal documentation
 - filters

Contributor list:
-----------------
 - Fabio N. Filasieno
 - Enea Bionda
info.name: HsmTranquillity
info.summary: A web server designed to ease development of asynchronous, scalable but but especially *reliable* web applications.
